text: Reinaldo Azambuja (born May 13, 1963) is a Brazilian politician. Since 2015 he has been the Governor of the Brazilian state of Mato Grosso do Sul. In elections in Mato Grosso do Sul in 2014 he ran for governor. Azambuja came in second place in the first round and won the election in the second round against the candidate Delcídio Amaral. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Governors of Mato Grosso do Sul Category:Living people Category:People from Campo Grande Category:Brazilian Social Democracy Party politicians
title: Reinaldo Azambuja
